The second season of Love Is Blind has been wild, to say the least.
From one couple breaking up on their honeymoon (Kyle and Shaina) to another who just cant seem to hit the right beat (Nick and Dan… [+3775 chars]

articles.author: Rosie Kinchen
articles.title: Steven Bartlett, the Dragons' Den star who's lured Matt Hancock (and his lover) to his den - The Times
articles.description: Not only is Steven Bartlett, the latest to join the Dragon Den’s line-up, the youngest ever, at 29, he is also proof that not listening to your parents can work out pretty well
articles.content: If there is a young person in your life who has no interest in school, is always fiddling around with their phone and has the attention span of a gnat, you may want to keep them away from this series… [+489 chars]
